full_threads.body:
it's okay @manuel thanks for checking

@joel could you please check this one? thanks!
@rica Sorry I don't have idea how to send the receipt.

Hi,

More on this….

I've tried this again but funds are not being taken out of my account and consequently I am not receiving a receipt.

Should the funds come out immediately?

Michelle.
@manuel could you please make the changes for this?

Hi Rica and Heath,

Thank you.

There's just a small thing on the wolper.com/membership page when the user is filling out the credit card details.

Could you please put the label CARDHOLDER NAME on the next lie above the input box.



Also, I've just renewed a membership as a test and I have received the acknowledgement message below but I have not received the receipt in my mail.

I have checked my spam.



Could you please take a look.

Thank you.

Michelle.

Hi Michelle, 

Hope you had a great weekend. Confirming that we have made the updates and ready for you to review.

Here are the links: 
https://wolper.com.au/membership/
https://wolper.com.au/new-membership/

Let us know if you would like further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
@heath please check the live site now.

https://wolper.com.au/membership/
https://wolper.com.au/new-membership/

Please let me know if any update.
Thanks.

@manuel yes great, please make the same updates on the live site. 

The payment form will need to be added to this page too /membership/ on the live site. With the text on the left to say:

Renew here
Thank you for your interest in renewing your membership. Our secure online form will collect all the required details. Membership is annual and is $30.00/year. You can also choose to add a donation during this process.
Once you have submitted the membership form and successfully paid, you will receive a receipt via email. If you don't receive the email, please check your junk/spam folder or call us on 02 9328 6077 to discuss.

Thanks

@heath @rica also this page to update the content.

https://staging-wolperhospital.kinsta.cloud/membership/

@heath @rica Please check If I did right. 

https://staging-wolperhospital.kinsta.cloud/new-membership/

just let me know. thanks.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Wolf,


Last year due to the pandemic we were not collecting the usual $30 membership fee or $30 membership renewal fee.

Time has come to reinstate this charge.


Changes will need to be made to these pages:


1. https://wolper.com.au/new-membership/

Please add the credit card payment function.
The cost of membership is $30.
The ability to add a donation should stay.

2. https://wolper.com.au/membership/

On the left the text should say:

Renew here
Thank you for your interest in renewing your membership. Our secure online form will collect all the required details. Membership is annual and is $30.00/year. You can also choose to add a donation during this process.
Once you have submitted the membership form and successfully paid, you will receive a receipt via email. If you don't receive the email, please check your junk/spam folder or call us on 02 9328 6077 to discuss.

Please also add the Membership details form with $30 payment function.



Wolf do you still have the PDFs of the receipts for donations, new membership and membership renewals?



Thanks,


Michelle.







Michelle Stockley

Marketing Manager

Wolper Jewish Hospital


E: michellestockley@wolper.com.au 8 Trelawney Street

T: 02 8324 2233 F: 02 9327 6910 Woollahra NSW 2025

M:0408 600 969 www.wolper.com.au

own virus checks before opening attachments.

unauthorised direct or indirect dissemination, use, disclosure or copying is strictly

Any views, advice or opinions contained in this communication are those of the
individual sender except where the sender specifies and with authority states them
to be the views of Wolper Jewish Hospital.
